page.title: 05Admiralty, A.R.E.
page.content:
The{Admiralty}is on a forty-seven acre site at{Holton Heath.}At night there are two men on the main gate and in the day time there are two men on the main gate and three men on another gate. Two hundred and five people are employed there.
They make all their own{rubber}for life rafts and a few other boats and things. They make and use other chemicals to put on the bottom of the boats to stop mussels clinging to the hull. They collect special{sea} {water from Weymouth}they can not get the water from Poole because the water at Poole is polluted. You would expect rubber to bounce but at the Admiralty they can make rubber that does not bounce.
